ErrnoException(java.lang.String, int).Description: Constructs an instance with the given function name and errno value.

Returns: the detail message string of this Throwable instance (which may be null).
getMessage().Description: Converts the stashed function name and errno value to a human-readable string. We do this here rather than in the constructor so that callers only pay for this if they need it.

ErrnoException(java.lang.String,int).Description: Constructs an instance with the given function name and errno value.

ErrnoException(java.lang.String,int,java.Description: Constructs an instance with the given function name, errno value, and cause.
ErrnoException(java.lang.String,int,java.FullName: public ErrnoException (String functionName, int errno, Throwable cause)

ClassDesc: A checked exception thrown when @B_android#system#Os_E@ methods fail. This exception contains the native errno value, for comparison against the constants in @B_android#system#OsConstants_E@, should sophisticated callers need to adjust their behavior based on the exact failure.
